alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 10 at 9:46AM MST until November 10 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Winter Storm Winds Down Today Over Northwestern South Dakota... .Snow will lift northeast out of the area today with only minor additional accumulations over northwestern South Dakota. Gusty northerly winds will create some areas of blowing snow and reduced visibilities where accumulating snow falls, mainly across northwestern South Dakota. Monitor NOAA Weather Radio for the latest information, forecasts, and warnings. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Harding County, Perkins County and Ziebach County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
